metadata.title: Erowid MDA Vault : Legal Status
metadata.description: Information on the legal status of MDA.

content:
Drug: MDA | cid: 1614
Source: erowid | Source description: Information on the legal status of MDA.
Erowid name: mda
Category: CHEMICALS
Field: Law

                    Text: 
                    ("Share Your Story" link. Needs quick login creation but no verification of contact info)

MDA

Legal Status

by Erowid

U.S. FEDERAL LAW #

Caution : All legal information should be verified through other sources. [see below]

U.S. FEDERAL LEGAL SUMMARY MDA REGULATED Yes STATUS Scheduled SCHEDULE Schedule I CLASSIFICATION Hallucinogen

MDA is Schedule I in the United States. This means it is illegal to manufacture, buy, possess, or distribute (sell, trade or give) without a DEA license.

INTERNATIONAL LAW #

Brazil #

MDA is listed as a controlled substance, making production, distribution, or possession illegal. (thanks P)

Canada #

MDA was added to Schedule I in 2012 (see http://www.parl.gc.ca/HousePublications/Publication.aspx?Docid=5124131&file=4). (thanks pgg) (last updated Sep 25 2012)

Italy (Italia) #


                    Context: 
                    This chunk provides detailed legal status and regulatory information for MDA, including U.S., international, and specific country laws. It is relevant for users seeking legal clarification about MDA's classification and restrictions worldwide, complementing the broader drug and chemical law index within the document.

metadata.title: Erowid MDA Vault : Legal Status
metadata.description: Information on the legal status of MDA.

content:
Drug: MDA | cid: 1614
Source: erowid | Source description: Information on the legal status of MDA.
Erowid name: mda
Category: CHEMICALS
Field: Law

                    Text: 
                    Canada #

MDA was added to Schedule I in 2012 (see http://www.parl.gc.ca/HousePublications/Publication.aspx?Docid=5124131&file=4). (thanks pgg) (last updated Sep 25 2012)

Italy (Italia) #

Listed in Tabella I of "Tabelle delle sostanze stupefacenti e psicotrope", making it illegal to possess, purchase, or sell. (see Tabelle delle sostanze stupefacenti e psicotrope. (thanks a) (last updated Dec 16, 2015)

New Zealand #

MDA is Schedule I (Class A) in New Zealand [reference]. (thanks BC)

U.K. #

MDA is Schedule I/Class A in the U.K., making it illegal to sell, buy, or possess without a license.

If you have information about the legal status of this substance in any other country, please let us know.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #


                    Context: 
                    This chunk provides detailed legal status information for MDA across multiple countries, including Canada, Italy, New Zealand, and the U.K., and is part of the broader section on chemical regulations within the full webpage. It is relevant for users seeking international legal perspectives on MDA and complements the global law overview presented in the document.

                    Text: 
                    If you have information about the legal status of this substance in any other country, please let us know.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #

Erowid legal information is a summary of data gathered from site visitors, government documents, websites, and other resources. We are not lawyers and can not guarantee the accuracy of the information provided here. We do our best to keep this information correct and up-to-date, but laws are complex and constantly changing. Laws may also vary from one jurisdiction to another (county, state, country, etc)...this list is not comprehensive.
